Main ScriptsÔÉÅ

  • run_function_test_app: Runs the function test app only.

  • run_opcua_server: Runs the OPC-UA server only.

  • run_server_connected_app: Runs the function test app connected to the OPC-UA server.

  • run_minimal_client: Runs an example client that sends out test messages to the OPC-UA server.

-> All scripts use the path problem defined in Path problem configuration
